LanguageData.SelectMissionRC: Select a mission from the options below.\nEach option costs 500 silver (finder's fee) to choose and requires to be within an orbital trade beacon.
LanguageData.RedHorse_AutoPlayDesc: Set up the radio to automatically play without needing to be adjusted.
LanguageData.RedHorse_ShuffleDesc: Reorder the order in which the tracks will play.
